Uses of Interface
golad.lib.Board

  • Packages that use Board 
    Package Description
    golad.lib
    This package provides classes and interfaces for observation and manipulation of GOLAD boards.
    golad.lib.impl
    This package provides abstract and concrete implementations of the concepts defined in golad.lib

    • Uses of Board in golad.lib

      Subinterfaces of Board in golad.lib 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MutableBoard
      This interface represents a GOLAD board which's state can be altered.
      Methods in golad.lib that return Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Board MoveFactory.getBoard()
      Returns the Board used for the validation of Moves.
      Board Move.getNewState()
      Returns the state this board is/will be in after this move.
      Board Move.getOriginalState()
      Returns the state this board was/is in before this move.
      Board Board.iterate()
      Generates the state of this Board after one iteration of GOLAD, and returns a Board containing it.
      Methods in golad.lib with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MutableBoard.copy(Board src, int srcx, int srcy, int trgx, int trgy, int w, int h)
      Copies the CellStates of a specified rectangular area of another Board.
      Move MoveFactory.createTestMove(Board board, CellState player, Move.Type type, int x, int y, int[] sx, int[] sy)
      Creates a Move validated against the provided Board for the provided player.

    • Uses of Board in golad.lib.impl

      Classes in golad.lib.impl that implement Board 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractBoard
      A basic abstract implementation of a Board
      class  AbstractMutableBoard
      A basic abstract implementation of a MutableBoard.
      class  DefaultBoard
      A basic implementation of a MutableBoard.
      class  DelegateBoard
      Encapsulates another Board into a readonly state.
      Methods in golad.lib.impl that return Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Board DefaultAbstractMoveFactory.getBoard() 
      Board DelegateBoard.iterate() 
      Methods in golad.lib.impl with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractMutableBoard.copy(Board src, int srcx, int srcy, int trgx, int trgy, int w, int h) 
      Constructors in golad.lib.impl with parameters of type Board 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultAbstractMoveFactory(Board board, CellState player)
      Creates a new DefaultAbstractMoveFactory.
      DefaultBoard(Board src)
      Creates a copy of the provided Board.
      DelegateBoard(Board parent)
      Encapsulates the provided Board into a readonly state.
